isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built Before 05/20/2003 - ELECTRICAL SYSTEM CONTROLLER AND SWITCH PACKS - ELECTRICAL SYSTEM CONTROLLER - ESC SWITCHED 5 VOLT SENSOR SUPPLY

svcproc.title: ESC SWITCHED 5 VOLT SENSOR SUPPLY
svcproc.para: The ESC provides a 5 volt sensor signal for several sensors on the vehicle. A DTC will be logged if the 5 volt signal is shorted to ground. A short in any sensor using the signal or on any circuit carrying the signal will cause all sensors to be inoperative.
